narrative.iWantTo: I test API Key is NOT replaced on the page

scenario.title: (APi Key - Geting Started page) Placeholder is shown when user is not logged in
scenario.step: Given open Getting Started page
When User is not logged to site (Getting Started)
Then check that API key is provided for all placeholders on Getting Started page
